title: (x) Boxing Day funky serif face - Fontdinerdotcom {Rainer}
content:
Hi, Could you please Id this for me

author: Lisa R

comments.content: [Fontdinerdotcom](http://web.archive.org/web/20121108031210/http:/www.fontdiner.com/silver.html). (Yes, it really is the name of the font). Popular retro freeware. Enjoy.
i knew this would be a fontdiner font before even opening the thread! \>^D
